Rudra, Bloodystrike put Life in a CR chamber in post #19044.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Amp::
> With one final blow he heaved his bladed right arm downward.  Out 
of the 
> corner of his eye he sees the darts.  As he raises his left arm it 
begins to 
> glow and releases three countermeasures to incinerate the darts.
